title: All 32 - New Orleans Saints: Drew Brees backlash plus Super Bowl aspirations with Jeff Duncan (Football 6/19)
description:
The Saints were enjoying a relatively normal offseason until a few weeks ago...Jeff Duncan of The Athletic joins guest host Sean Wagner-McGough to discuss the backlash to Drew Brees' comments regarding kneeling (1:00), the locker room mending that had to take place and if anything related to the matter will linger into the season. They also analyze Brees' output on the field in his 40s (5:00), New Orleans' quarterback room and the addition of Emmanuel Sanders (9:00). Focus then shifts to the defense and especially on the team welcoming back Malcolm Jenkins into the secondary and into a needed leadership role (12:00). Finally, Jeff touches on the biggest position battle (15:00) and lofty expectations for the Saints in 2020 (18:30).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @seanjwagner, @JeffDuncan_
